Name: FOOTSIES Rollback Edition
About the game: FOOTSIES is a simple 2D ground-based fighting game that both new and experienced players can pick up and enjoy right away. While the game controls and mechanics are simple, FOOTSIES retains the fundamental feeling of the fighting game genre where spacing, hit confirm and whiff punish are keys to achieve victory. Features - Arcade Mode - Offline versus mode (player/cpu) - Online versus mode (rollback netcode) - Online lobby (up to 10 players, chat, spectators) - Training mode - Command list with frame data - Hitbox viewer - Hit Confirm and Whiff Punish Minigames Official FOOTSIES Discord:
